com.bill.java.api.models

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bill.java.api.net.ApiResource
      • com.bill.java.api.models.Item

  • public class Item
extends ApiResource
    For customers, an Item defines products or services provided by the organization. For vendors, this describes the products or services provided to the organization. Items can be used in both bills and invoices.
